com.gocardless.resources

Class Mandate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gocardless.resources.Mandate

  • public class Mandate
extends Object

    Represents a mandate resource returned from the API.

    Mandates represent the Direct Debit mandate with a customer.

    GoCardless will notify you via a webhook whenever the status of a mandate changes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Mandate.Links 
      static class  Mandate.Status

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Fixed timestamp, recording when this resource was created.

      Unique identifier, beginning with “MD”.
      Mandate.Links getLinks() 
      Map<String,String> getMetadata()
      Key-value store of custom data.
      String getNextPossibleChargeDate()
      The earliest date a newly created payment for this mandate could be charged.
      String getReference()
      Unique 6 to 18 character reference.
      String getScheme()
      Direct Debit scheme to which this mandate and associated payments are submitted.
      Mandate.Status getStatus()
      One of: pending_submission: the mandate has not yet been submitted to the customer’s bank submitted: the mandate has been submitted to the customer’s bank but has not been processed yet active: the mandate has been successfully set up by the customer’s bank failed: the mandate could not be created cancelled: the mandate has been cancelled expired: the mandate has expired due to dormancy

    • Method Detail

      • getCreatedAt

        public String getCreatedAt()

        Fixed timestamp, recording when this resource was created.

      • getId

        public String getId()

        Unique identifier, beginning with “MD”.

      • getLinks

        public Mandate.Links getLinks()

      • getMetadata

        public Map<String,String> getMetadata()

        Key-value store of custom data. Up to 3 keys are permitted, with key names up to 50 characters and values up to 200 characters.

      • getNextPossibleChargeDate

        public String getNextPossibleChargeDate()

        The earliest date a newly created payment for this mandate could be charged.

      • getReference

        public String getReference()

        Unique 6 to 18 character reference. Can be supplied or auto-generated.

      • getScheme

        public String getScheme()

        Direct Debit scheme to which this mandate and associated payments are submitted. Can be supplied or automatically detected from the customer’s bank account. Currently only “bacs”, “sepa_core”, and “sepa_cor1” are supported.

      • getStatus

        public Mandate.Status getStatus()

        One of:

        • pending_submission: the mandate has not yet been submitted to the customer’s bank
        • submitted: the mandate has been submitted to the customer’s bank but has not been processed yet
        • active: the mandate has been successfully set up by the customer’s bank
        • failed: the mandate could not be created
        • cancelled: the mandate has been cancelled
        • expired: the mandate has expired due to dormancy
